name: Out With a Bang
description:
You've snuck into your rival's underground headquarters to stop the production of his goods, but oops! You activated a nuclear bomb and have 2 minutes to escape!

Welcome to Out With a Bang, where you must discover your way through the game's mechanics and try to generate as much energy as possible. This game was originally inspired by the Countdown Ending of The Stanley Parable.

Disclaimers: The Enter trick is required for certain sections of this game, this game is not for mobile, there is accidental flashing colors and UI in some parts of the game, and it is highly recommended that you use Fullscreen.

Anyways, have fun, and try not to die!
